name: The Only Good Gremlin is a Dead Gremlin
name_original: The Only Good Gremlin is a Dead Gremlin
description:
Recovering lost files has never been an easy task, with the infestation of gremlins throughout cyber space it only got tougher, and more dangerous. 

Acid and Override, business partners and best friends, are expert gremlin slayers. They digitalize themselves to fight the gremlins and recover files. Today a friendly author named Gladys needs her manuscripts recovered from her PC.

Keep her writing career alive!

wasd or arrows to move

click to attack in the direction of the mouse

acquire new weapons, find the lost files, and move on to the next area without succumbing to the gremlins' attacks or falling into the cybernetic void below the cybertiles.
